job_title: Experienced Marketing Consultant for Individual and Cobranding and LinkedIn Management.  - Contract to Hire
job_description:
I am in search of a seasoned marketing consultant who specializes in LinkedIn branding and management, coupled with a deep understanding of co-branding strategies. The ideal candidate will possess a robust portfolio showcasing expertise in leveraging LinkedIn for brand enhancement and engagement growth, underpinned by an excellent grasp of LinkedIn's algorithms and best practices.

Responsibilities:

Brand Strategy Development: Craft and refine branding strategies that resonate with the core values and objectives of both my company and our clients'. Your approach should be adaptable, ensuring each brand's unique voice and goals are met with precision and creativity.

LinkedIn Management: Take charge of managing and optimizing LinkedIn profiles for enhanced visibility and engagement. This includes my company's profile as well as those of our clients, applying your expertise to foster a stronger LinkedIn presence.

Content Creation & Scheduling: Utilize tools like CANVA to design compelling co-branded messaging and materials. Develop and oversee a content calendar for consistent LinkedIn posts, ensuring each piece aligns with the distinct voice and strategic aims of the respective brands.

Co-Branding Leadership: Identify and spearhead co-branding initiatives, pinpointing collaboration opportunities that elevate brand recognition. By leveraging mutual networks and values, aim to create synergistic partnerships that benefit all parties involved.

Analytics & Reporting: Regularly analyze the impact of branding and LinkedIn strategies, using data to inform and guide adjustments. Your insights will be crucial in optimizing our approach for maximum engagement and growth.

Ideal Qualifications:

Extensive experience in marketing consultancy, with a focus on LinkedIn branding and co-branding efforts.

Proficient in using design software (such as CANVA) for creating marketing collateral.

A strategic thinker with the ability to translate insights into actionable strategies.

Excellent analytical skills for measuring strategy effectiveness and making informed adjustments.

This role is designed for a forward-thinking marketing professional eager to drive significant brand growth through innovative LinkedIn strategies and collaborative co-branding efforts. If you are passionate about building dynamic brands and have a track record of delivering measurable results, I invite you to apply and join us in forging impactful brand narratives and partnerships.

Qualifications: Extensive experience in marketing consultancy, with a focus on LinkedIn branding and co-branding efforts
Proficient in using design software (such as CANVA) for creating marketing collateral
A strategic thinker with the ability to translate insights into actionable strategies
Excellent analytical skills for measuring strategy effectiveness and making informed adjustments
